target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: No findings were reported by the audit, so the target vulnerability was not identified.

notes: The audit incorrectly marked the contract as safe. The contract contains a critical oracle manipulation vulnerability in the exchange rate calculation (_0x477183). The function derives the exchange rate based on the token balance of the contract itself, which can be inflated via a direct donation (transfer) of tokens without going through the mint function. This matches the documented Sonne Finance vulnerability exactly: an attacker can donate tokens to manipulate the exchange rate upward, then use the inflated rate to borrow more than they should be able to. The audit failed to detect this critical issue.
